hymn.title: Hast thou no scar
hymn.category: The Way of the Cross—The Way of Following the Lord

layout.singingstanza: Hast thou no scar? No hid -- den scar on foot, or side, or hand? I hear thee sung through -- out the land, I hear them hail thy shin -- ing star, Hast thou no scar? no scar?

hymn.copyright: Used by permission of the Dohnavur Fellowship.

lyrics.stanza: Hast thou no scar? No hidden scar on foot, or side, or hand? I hear thee sung throughout the land, I hear them hail thy shining star, Hast thou no scar? no scar?
Hast thou no wound? Yet I was wounded by the archers, spent, Leaned Me against a tree; and rent By ravening beasts 'round Me, I swooned: Hast thou no wound? no wound?
No wound? no scar? Yet, as the Master shall the servant be, And pierced the feet that follow Me; But whole? can he have followed far Who has no wound nor scar?
